rows.title: What is Wiser?
rows.content: We are a platform that connects you with an expert, so you can have a one on one conversation and get personalized advice.

rows.title: How do I know if he is an expert?
rows.content: We have verified every profiles manually to make sure you get the best advice

rows.title: Why are you doing this?
rows.content: Financial instruments are unnecessarily complex, even the professionals have trouble understanding many. If you are new, you must have already done some quick research through google search and youtube, it's a good start. But the information you received must be generic and you must still have some questions that is personal to your situation. Your next options are either to call a mutual fund house, who will then start promoting you their products! or find a consultant who will charge you 500-1000 rupees a call. This is a gap that we want to fill. Give unbiased expert advice at the lowest cost possible.

rows.title: Will you charge me?
rows.content: No! For now we have decided to offer the service entirely free.

rows.title: I have a few suggestions, how should I tell you?
rows.content: Just fill out the contact us form below!
